# C .gitignore
# Covers both Unix and Windows platforms

# C object files (Unix)
*.o
*.ko
*.elf

# C object files (Windows)
*.obj

# Static libraries (Unix)
*.a
*.la
*.lo

# Static libraries (Windows)
*.lib

# Shared libraries (Unix)
*.so
*.so.*
*.dylib

# Shared libraries (Windows)
*.dll

# Executables (Unix)
*.out
*.app

# Executables (Windows)
*.exe
*.com

# CMake generated files
CMakeCache.txt
CMakeFiles/
cmake_install.cmake
CTestTestfile.cmake
_deps/
build/
Build/

# Make generated files
*.d

# Preprocessed files
*.i
*.ii
*.s

# Debug files
*.dSYM/
*.su
*.idb
*.pdb

# Visual Studio files
*.sln
*.vcxproj
*.vcxproj.filters
*.vcxproj.user
.vs/
x64/
x86/
Debug/
Release/

# Clang/LLVM
compile_commands.json
.clangd/

# Core dumps
core
core.*
vgcore.*

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~
.*.swp
